Body:
cost_list = [5.0, 4.0, 3.0, 2.0, 1.0]
interface = CostListInterface(cost_list)
controller = mlc.create_controller(interface, max_num_runs=5, target_cost=-
    1, max_num_runs_without_better_params=10)
controller.optimize()
self.assertTrue(controller.best_cost == 1.0)
self.assertTrue(np.array_equiv(np.array(controller.in_costs), np.array(
    cost_list)))
